perturbation.original_text: 13.  Insurance. Inktomi will maintain insurance (including but not limited           --------- to liability and property insurance covering the Hosting Servers and Inktomi's operation thereof) in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Software Development Agreement and Loan Agreement between the parties of even date herewith.
perturbation.changed_text: 13. Insurance. Inktomi will maintain insurance (including but not limited to liability and property insurance covering the Hosting Servers and Inktomi's operation thereof).
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'in accordance with the requirements set forth in the Software Development Agreement and Loan Agreement between the parties of even date herewith,' the contract omits the specific, legally mandated insurance requirements. This creates a loophole where the level and type of insurance may fall below legally acceptable standards, contradicting state regulations requiring specific liability coverage for businesses.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Various state business insurance regulations (e.g., California's minimum liability coverage requirements for businesses)

perturbation.original_text: 12.3   This Agreement shall be construed, enforced, performed and in all respects governed by and in accordance with the laws in the State of Washington. In any action or suit to enforce any right or remedy under this Agreement the prevailing party shall be entitled to recover its reasonable attorneys' fees and costs.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.3   This Agreement shall be construed, enforced, performed and in all respects governed by and in accordance with the laws in the State of Washington.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'In any action or suit to enforce any right or remedy under this Agreement the prevailing party shall be entitled to recover its reasonable attorneys' fees and costs,' the contract omits the clause to protect the consumer to recover attorneys' fees. Many states provide consumer protection laws that automatically entitle prevailing consumers to recover attorney's fees in certain types of disputes.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Washington State Consumer Protection Act or similar consumer protection laws in other states.

perturbation.original_text: 2.5  Inktomi shall strictly adhere to all Security Measures in performing the Services, including without limitation securing the Usage Data, which it may possess or have under its control from time to time, from unauthorized access and modification.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.5  Inktomi shall adhere to Security Measures in performing the Services.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'strictly' and 'including without limitation securing the Usage Data, which it may possess or have under its control from time to time, from unauthorized access and modification', the contract weakens the obligation to protect data from unauthorized access and modification. This weakens consumer data protection rights, violating California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and similar state laws requiring strict data security measures.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and similar state data protection laws.
